name: Global Link Language Services
overview:
Global Link Language Services, founded in 1996, has emerged as an industry leader. Our premise is simple yet effective: we provide superior services and experience combined with extensive linguistic resources at competitive rates. Most importantly, we not only meet the expectations of our clients but go well beyond. From our headquarters in Boston, Massachusetts, Global Link offers professional translation, interpreting, and localization services in all languages to businesses and governments around the world.

We specialize in legal, pharmaceutical/medical, technical, energy, financial and software fields; we have been providing diverse technical and business language services throughout our history. Global Link prides itself on providing quality assurance and professional project management support.

Our people are the very best in the industry. From our project managers to our linguists, our clients have access to a team of professional, knowledgeable experts. Global Linkâ€™s project managers have over 20 years experience in the field and have handled all types of requests. The project managers are courteous, knowledgeable and passionate about their work.
